EmailTemplate.description: Email template for - when the case status is put to resolved
EmailTemplate.name: Internal Case Resolved
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} : {!Case.Subject} Resolved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFirstName},
The case '{!Case.CaseNumber} : {!Case.Subject}' has been resolved. Please verify the fix and mark the case status to 'Closed' if the issue has been resolved.
Regards, Technology Support
